    1. receiveUserInput(Message)

Interface RMIVirtualServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, VirtualServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIClientHandler
public interface RMIVirtualServer extends Remote, VirtualServer
Represents a remote interface for server-side operations that can be invoked by an RMI client.
Version:
2.0
Author:
giacomoamaducci

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    receiveUserInput(Message userInput)
    Passes a UserInput object from the client to the server to be interpreted and converted into relevant game actions.

  • Method Details

    • receiveUserInput

      void receiveUserInput(Message userInput) throws RemoteException
      Passes a UserInput object from the client to the server to be interpreted and converted into relevant game actions.
      Parameters:
      userInput - the UserInput object containing the client's input.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote method invocation.
